subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ben Gordon scored 12 of his 18 points in the fourth quarter and the Bulls beat the Nets in Chicago on Saturday, 103-94. In Philadelphia, the 76ers beat the Pistons.
snippet: Ben Gordon scored 12 of his 18 points in the fourth quarter and the Bulls beat the Nets in Chicago on Saturday, 103-94. In Philadelphia, the 76ers beat the Pistons.
